definition: first line of the Thousand Character Classic 千字文[Qian1 zi4 wen2]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
the seven planets of premodern astronomy (the Sun, the Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn)

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
the five regions: the east, south, west, north and center/all parts/China and the lands beyond its frontiers
nine divide by nine is one (abacus rule)/when all is said and done
